Name: Magika Land of Fantasy
About the game: Play as a powerful wizard to repeal the attack on your kingdom! Use your spells to survive through an intense journey with deadly enemies and traps to save Magika! Throw magic fireballs to enemies Cast magic shields to become invincible Dodge deadly traps Fight huge enemies Achieved with Unreal Engine 4.
